com.jenjinstudios.io.connection

Class ConnectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jenjinstudios.io.connection.ConnectionBuilder

  • public class ConnectionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to configure and create a Connection.

      • build

        public Connection build()
        Build a connection using all the values supplied to this builder.
        Returns:

      • withSocket

        public void withSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Construct a new ConnectionBuilder that will establish a connection over the given socket.
        Parameters:
        socket - The socket over which the connection will be made.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an exception when creating streams from the given socket.

      • withMessageIOFactory

        Use the given MessageIOFactory to create MessageReader and MessageWriter instances from Java Input and Output streams.
        Parameters:
        factory - The MessageIOFactory.

      • withExecutionContext

        public void withExecutionContext(ExecutionContext context)
        Build a connection with the given ExecutionContext.
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the Connection will execute messages.
